channel.title: (PI) How to alter where the wildy starts (levels go up from)
channel.description:
Uhm, is there any way i can change where the wildy starts, that being above edge usually, so it would make edge etc higher levels?
or is it just a matter of deleting the old wildy coords, and replacing them?

item.title: (PI) How to alter where the wildy starts (levels go up from)
item.dc:creator: @jeddac jeddac
item.description:
@jeddac wrote:

i suppose finding the y coordinate and just searching that through the usual files might help?
i’ll try that in a min ^^

Read full topic

item.title: (PI) How to alter where the wildy starts (levels go up from)
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

[quote=“jeddac, post:1, topic:357974”]Uhm, is there any way i can change where the wildy starts, that being above edge usually, so it would make edge etc higher levels?

or is it just a matter of deleting the old wildy coords, and replacing them?[/quote]

What controls where the wildy starts is the Y coordinate of the wilderness method in your server.
I don’t know anything about PI so I can’t help you much.
You could search you files for anything wilderness related.

Read full topic
